description: This file defines the 'NoteDao' interface for data access operations related to 'Note' objects in a Room database. It includes methods to retrieve, insert, update, delete, and search notes, with some query annotations and LiveData return types.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Data Access Object interface for 'Note' entities, providing database query and modification methods.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last update timestamp in descending order, returned as LiveData.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID, returned as LiveData.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database; replaces existing record on conflict, returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note, returns the number of rows affected.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specific note, returns the number of rows affected.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes by title or content matching the query, ordered by update time descending, returned as LiveData.
